initial_message: You awaken at your desk. A map you didn't draw is pinned to your notebook.

main_mission.description: Decipher Rozel's forbidden map before the Second Moon.

side_missions.description: Find your roommate's hidden dream diary.

actions.text: Follow the wet footsteps outside your door.
Inspect the map with a magnifying glass.
Whisper a prayer to the moon.
Step outside and scream for help.
Touch the page with a silver coin.
